name: Cleaner.EXE
description:
Game Description:

As a small robot, you can place AI-s, with whom you have to clean a house together. However, AI-s uses RAM, which you need to make sure you always have enough.

Credits:

Game made by Szenos, by a hungarian game developer.

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/mfstudio23 (non-English)

Music made in: https://ecrettmusic.com/ website

Sfxs: Own and YouTube audio library
